DescriptionArea: Good Morning ,  will like to change my working model time  from documentation recording on chronus to time based recording. Please any help on how to go about this?
Response:
Hi, Chronos just doesn't automatically change from the "time recording" mode to the "documentation" mode. You have to actively initiate a switch from "time recording" to "documentation". A little screen then pops up and asks you if you really want to change the mode. So you have to click on "change mode" before the mode switches. "You can switch between time recording and documentation mode every 6 months on the first day of the month. If you switch to documentation, your flexi time account will be frozen."

Unfortunately we can't manually change the setting back to "time recording" mode once you've initiated a change. You have to apply for the "time recording" mode in Chronos again and wait for the 6 months period to pass.

You can find more information on the intranet page:

A little screen then pops up and asks you if you really want to change the mode. So you have to click on "change mode" before the mode switches. "You can switch between time recording and documentation mode every 6 months on the first day of the month. If you switch to documentation, your flexi time account will be frozen."

Unfortunately we can't manually change the setting back to "time recording" mode once you've initiated a change. You have to apply for the "time recording" mode in Chronos again and wait for the 6 months period to pass.

You can find more information on the intranet page:
